name: 汪家昌
objective: 積層製造(3D列印)加工原理、積層製造系統分類、加工參數與加工結果分析，製程設備研究，快速模具技術研究，積層製造與快速模具實習，專題研究與討論。
schedule:
週次　　講授內容概要
1　　The Development of Additive Manufacturing Systems
2　　Classification of AM (Laser, Nozzle)
3　　Photo-Polymerization Fabrication Process/ Basic knowledge of photo-polymerization
4　　SLA-Solid Imaging; SLP, EDART; SGC; Others
5　　Nozzle type Polymerization Fabrication Process/ Basic knowledge of liner polymer Thermal Plastic polymerization
6　　Thermal jet, MM, FDM
7　　Powder Fabrication Process/ Basic knowledge of metallurgy
8　　SLS, EOS, 3DP, LENS
9　　Alternative Fabrication Process/ Basic knowledge of cutting
LOM, SDM
10　　Mid-exam
11　　Micro RP, 3D Micro Fabrication (Micro-Stereolithography: LCD, DLP, Dynamic Photo Mask)
12,13　　Rapid Tooling and Rapid Manufacturing
14　　Applications (Industrial, Medical, Potential)
15-18　　Software for AM, the slicing technique
scorePolicy:
平時表現 30%
期中考   30%
期末報告 40%
materials:
提供投影片教材(PDF)
Additive Manufacturing Technologies (3D Printing, Rapid Prototyping, and Direct Digital Manufacturing) ISBN 978-1-4939-2112-6
